headline: ChatGPT Thinks Robinhood Stock Will Close At This Price In The Next 60 Days
summary: Quick Summary ChatGPT thinks Robinhood stock could slip over the next 60 days, projecting a move toward roughly $114.50 after a strong 2025 run. Investors looking to trade around that pullback without committing full size can build or trim exposure...

headline: CME Group to Launch 100-Ounce Silver Futures to Meet Record Retail Demand
summary: CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, today announced it will launch a 100-Ounce Silver futures contract on February 9, 2026, pending regulatory review.

raw.headline: CME Group to Launch 100-Ounce Silver Futures to Meet Record Retail Demand

headline: Robinhood’s Blockchain and Prediction Markets Pivot Might Change The Case For Investing In Robinhood Markets (HOOD)
summary: In recent months, Robinhood Markets expanded its crypto arm into tokenized stocks, staking, and a forthcoming Ethereum-based layer-2 network, while its prediction markets business grew into a meaningful revenue contributor by late 2025. This combination of new blockchain infrastructure and fast-growing prediction markets signals a broader shift toward more diversified, transaction-driven income beyond traditional trading. We’ll now examine how Robinhood’s rapid prediction markets growth...
